questions.question: Why might one want to use an AttributeValueMapper to convert missing and empty values to nulls?
options: The workspace converts data from a format that does not support nulls, to one that does.
The workspace will fail with an error if you write out any missing or empty values.
The workspace will not work on FME Server if it writes missing or empty values.
The workspace will not work on Linux if it writes missing or empty values.

questions.question: My reader format supports nulls and includes known null values in the data. My writer format is a simple text format that does not support nulls. What must I do to get my workspace to work correctly?
options: Delete the attributes with the AttributeRemover.
Set the advanced reader parameter "Read Nulls as Empty" to Yes.
Use the NullAttributeMapper to convert all <null> values to <empty>.
Nothing, the writer will convert the values as necessary.

questions.question: Which transformer can you use to easily set attribute values to null?
